content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Park Opening & Availability” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23022f66″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Before buying your tickets, please check to see if your ticket type is available on your desired date before purchasing your ticket. You may also wish to check the discounts available for your chosen date. Remember your selected date when choosing tickets, add-ons, and meals. Different types of tickets, like Standard, Fast-track, Premium, etc., may have varied availability.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][calendar_element][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Booking Terms & Conditions” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23022f66″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]
  • All payments to Giwa Gardens shall be electronic
  • All tickets and options are nontransferable and nonrefundable and exclude activities/events separately priced.
  • Parks, side attractions, certain experiences, services, amenities and other offerings are subject to availability, closures and change or cancellation without notice or liability.
  • Read the full terms here
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
